EmailTemplate.subject: Is there anything Univar can help you with?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
At Univar, we value each and every one of our customers. It’s been a while since you’ve last placed an order with us, and we would like to take the opportunity to re-introduce ourselves.
As a valued Univar customer, you can expect an innovative approach to your formulation challenges, receiving technical support from concept to production. Univar supplies the market place with much more than a comprehensive line of chemicals and ingredients. When considering a supply, consider Univar as your one-stop for innovation, expertise, and a partner in meeting your business challenges.
Univar would like the opportunity to assist with your needs. If you have a questions, or want to learn more about our line of products and services simply respond to this email, and a representative will respond to your request.
We look forward to assisting you.
Sincerely,
Univar
